text: Presidential elections were held in Peru in 1904. José Pardo y Barreda of the Civilista Party was elected unopposed.Fernando Tuesta Soldevilla (2001) Perú politítico en cifras, Friedrich Ebert Stiftung, p610 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Party !Votes !% |- |align=left|José Pardo y Barreda||align=left|Civilista Party||96,430||100 |- |colspan=2 align=left|Invalid/blank votes||1,289||− |- |colspan=2 align=left|Total||97,719||100 |- |colspan=2 align=left|Registered voters/turnout||146,990||66.48 |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: Tuesta |} ==References== 1904 Category:1904 elections in South America Category:1904 in Peru
title: 1904 Peruvian presidential election
